original_text: When Silas and Timothy came from Macedonia, Paul devoted himself exclusively to preaching, testifying to the Jews that Jesus was the Messiah.
korean_text: 실라와 디모데가 마게도냐로부터 내려오매 바울이 하나님의 말씀에 붙잡혀 유대인들에게 예수는 그리스도라 밝히 증언하니

sentences.original_text: When Silas and Timothy came from Macedonia
Paul devoted himself exclusively to preaching
